properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord's my shepherd,
I'll not want.
He makes me down to lie,
in pastures green:
he leadeth me the quiet
waters by.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My soul he doth restore again;
and me to walk doth
make within the paths
of righteousness,
ev'n for his own name's sake.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yea, though I walk in death's
dark vale,
yet will I fear none ill:
for thou art with me,
and thy rod and staff me
comfort still.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My table thou hast furnished
in presence of my foes;
my head thou dost
with oil anoint,
and my cup overflows.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Goodness and mercy
all my life shall surely
follow me:
and in God's house for
ever more my dwelling
place shall be.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hallellujah, Hallellujah
Hallellujah, Hallellujah
Hallellujah, Hallellujah,
Hallellujah, Hallellujah
Amen.
